mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PW,MEMBER_POINT FROM MGM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id} AND MEMBER_PW=#{member_pw} AND MEMBER_DELFLAG='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGM_MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHNUM, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_POINT,MEMBER_REGDATE) VALUES (#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_address},#{member_name},#{member_birth},#{member_phnum},'N',100,NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHNUM,MEMBER_POINT,MEMBER_REGDATE,(SELECT COUNT(MESSAGE_SEQ) FROM MGM_MESSAGE WHERE MGM_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_RECEIVER = #{uid} AND MGM_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_READ="N" AND MGM_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_DELFLAG="N") AS MESSAGE_COUNT,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MGM_BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER=#{uid} AND BOARD_DELFLAG="N") AS BOARD_COUNT FROM MGM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE MGM_MEMBER SET MEMBER_DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{uid};
